author: jochembrouwer
content: I would also strongly suggest to ship PAY. This is a super helpful DevEx tool and I honestly think it should be a no-brainer to add this (either with or without EOF)

author: jochembrouwer
content: Without PAY if you want to send ETH you are forced to execute code (if it exists) on the target account. Which is not nice. And it also wastes gas
